5D22EA2D.Line1.B757A: Malnok was a settlement before the khazra sorcerers emerged from the mountain. Now goatmen congregate there in large numbers. I've seen firsthand the foul magics they practice.

F71763AF.Line3.B757A: You will need to shatter the khazra before you can seek the Grizzly's Maul. Many have tried, but none have yet succeeded.
